```{r}
library(tidyverse)

source("http://www.openintro.org/stat/data/cdc.R")
cdc <- as_tibble(cdc)

ggplot(data=cdc) +
  geom_jitter(mapping = aes(x = weight, y = height, color= gender)) 

```



```{r}
library(tidyverse)

source("http://www.openintro.org/stat/data/cdc.R")
cdc <- as_tibble(cdc)

ggplot(data=cdc) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = weight, y = wtdesire, color= gender))
```
